data.title: Cost of Living in Moscow
data.meta_description: Average prices of more than 40 products and services in Moscow, RussiaAug 2024. Prices of restaurants, food, transportation, utilities and housing are included.
data.text:
Restaurants

Edit Range Meal, Inexpensive Restaurant 900.00 руб 600.00-1,500.00 Meal for 2 People, Mid-range Restaurant, Three-course 4,000.00 руб 3,000.00-7,000.00 McMeal at McDonalds (or Equivalent Combo Meal) 450.00 руб 400.00-550.00 Domestic Beer (0.5 liter draught) 300.00 руб 200.00-450.00 Imported Beer (0.33 liter bottle) 300.00 руб 168.76-500.00 Cappuccino (regular) 239.06 руб 130.21-350.00 Coke/Pepsi (0.33 liter bottle) 103.37 руб 60.00-200.00 Water (0.33 liter bottle) 51.08 руб 30.00-150.00

Markets

Edit Milk (regular), (1 liter) 87.79 руб 70.00-110.00 Loaf of Fresh White Bread (500g) 56.94 руб 40.00-100.00 Rice (white), (1kg) 124.42 руб 75.00-190.00 Eggs (regular) (12) 155.66 руб 120.00-180.00 Local Cheese (1kg) 846.04 руб 500.00-1,350.00 Chicken Fillets (1kg) 431.90 руб 250.00-533.00 Beef Round (1kg) (or Equivalent Back Leg Red Meat) 875.93 руб 600.00-1,200.00 Apples (1kg) 137.10 руб 70.00-200.00 Banana (1kg) 146.83 руб 110.00-170.00 Oranges (1kg) 148.06 руб 94.00-250.00 Tomato (1kg) 295.56 руб 140.00-435.00 Potato (1kg) 43.49 руб 20.00-70.00 Onion (1kg) 42.96 руб 20.00-60.00 Lettuce (1 head) 112.39 руб 50.00-160.00 Water (1.5 liter bottle) 56.13 руб 40.00-90.00 Bottle of Wine (Mid-Range) 700.00 руб 499.00-1,200.00 Domestic Beer (0.5 liter bottle) 80.35 руб 50.00-120.00 Imported Beer (0.33 liter bottle) 161.92 руб 100.00-250.00 Cigarettes 20 Pack (Marlboro) 238.50 руб 200.00-300.00

Transportation

Edit One-way Ticket (Local Transport) 60.00 руб 54.00-70.00 Monthly Pass (Regular Price) 2,730.00 руб 2,200.00-3,150.00 Taxi Start (Normal Tariff) 250.00 руб 150.00-400.00 Taxi 1km (Normal Tariff) 40.00 руб 20.00-100.00 Taxi 1hour Waiting (Normal Tariff) 570.00 руб 420.00-1,000.00 Gasoline (1 liter) 56.82 руб 52.00-65.00 Volkswagen Golf 1.4 90 KW Trendline (Or Equivalent New Car) 3,000,000.00 руб 2,300,000.00-3,600,000.00 Toyota Corolla Sedan 1.6l 97kW Comfort (Or Equivalent New Car) 3,098,372.09 руб 2,700,000.00-3,700,000.00

Utilities (Monthly)

Edit Basic (Electricity, Heating, Cooling, Water, Garbage) for 85m2 Apartment 10,854.06 руб 8,000.00-15,000.00 Mobile Phone Monthly Plan with Calls and 10GB+ Data 545.33 руб 300.00-800.00 Internet (60 Mbps or More, Unlimited Data, Cable/ADSL) 580.42 руб 500.00-850.00

Sports And Leisure

Edit Fitness Club, Monthly Fee for 1 Adult 2,986.23 руб 1,700.00-6,000.00 Tennis Court Rent (1 Hour on Weekend) 2,603.82 руб 2,000.00-3,500.00 Cinema, International Release, 1 Seat 500.00 руб 400.00-700.00

Childcare

Edit Preschool (or Kindergarten), Full Day, Private, Monthly for 1 Child 43,914.29 руб 28,000.00-75,000.00 International Primary School, Yearly for 1 Child 1,021,021.35 руб 600,000.00-1,800,000.00

Clothing And Shoes

Edit 1 Pair of Jeans (Levis 501 Or Similar) 8,715.62 руб 3,000.00-18,000.00 1 Summer Dress in a Chain Store (Zara, H&M, ...) 4,288.04 руб 2,000.00-7,000.00 1 Pair of Nike Running Shoes (Mid-Range) 10,926.95 руб 6,000.00-20,000.00 1 Pair of Men Leather Business Shoes 10,368.85 руб 5,000.00-16,000.00

Rent Per Month

Edit Apartment (1 bedroom) in City Centre 87,764.71 руб 65,000.00-130,000.00 Apartment (1 bedroom) Outside of Centre 49,261.46 руб 40,000.00-69,442.93 Apartment (3 bedrooms) in City Centre 175,030.77 руб 120,000.00-275,000.00 Apartment (3 bedrooms) Outside of Centre 88,593.05 руб 70,000.00-150,000.00

Buy Apartment Price

Edit Price per Square Meter to Buy Apartment in City Centre 553,920.08 руб 450,000.00-1,000,000.00 Price per Square Meter to Buy Apartment Outside of Centre 308,344.69 руб 250,000.00-400,000.00

Salaries And Financing

Edit Average Monthly Net Salary (After Tax) 115,999.39 руб
